thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Trump Administration’s ‘Notorious’ List Names Markets in Russia, China

author: William Mauldin
title: Trump Administration’s ‘Notorious’ List Names Markets in Russia, China
text:
The Trump administration on Friday targeted markets in Russia, China and other countries—including a Chinese mall in Canada—for allegedly turning a blind eye to the sale of counterfeit goods and other intellectual-property violations.

The “notorious markets” list, published by the U.S. trade representative’s office, names online or physical marketplaces believed to facilitate the sale of pirated goods. The latest version again blames Russian social media network VKontakte.com for allegedly allowing the exchange of Hollywood...
